description: Try our easy to follow Summer Sunset Iceblocks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Summer Sunset Iceblocks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup orange juice, freshly squeezed, strained

recipeInstructions.text: Process mango and 2 tsp syrup in a food processor until smooth. Divide mango mixture evenly between 10 x 1/3cup iceblock moulds. Insert sticks and freeze for about 1 hour or until firm.
Combine orange juice and 1/2 tsp cranberry juice in a jug. Pour evenly over firm mango layer. Freeze for about 1 hour or until firm.
Process strawberries and remaining syrup in a food processor until smooth. Stir in remaining cranberry juice. Pour strawberry mixture over firm orange layer. Freeze overnight or until firm.
To serve, dip moulds briefly in hot water to loosen and carefully remove iceblocks.
